snippet.title: Deck of Ashes: Complete Edition - Launch Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10002575/

Deck of Ashes, hardcore story-driven RPG with card-based tactical combat is already available to play! It's time to go on a challenging adventure, fight dangerous enemies and try to break the curse of the ashes.

One character at a time, lead the cast of antiheroes on a quest for redemption. Explore the cursed fantasy world and hunt down powerful cards. Put your survival and resource management skills to the test when upgrading your Camp of allies.

The choices that drive your journey - where to go, which resource to collect, which risk to take, and which card to craft - are the difference between success and untimely demise. 

Will you dare to challenge the Ash Course?
